input.sentences: architecture can be one of the most beautiful things about a city .
many old theaters have wonderful architectural and decorative elements from the ceiling down to the floor | and everywhere in between .
architecture involves more than just the building 's facade and interior | it can also include stairways and landings .
roofs are also often overlooked by tourists .
sometimes | a long-distance view helps people to pick up on architectural details that can be missed when they are up close to the building .
output.sentences: Cities are full of beautiful architecture.
An ambitious young college student found excitement in literally anything, even finding the theater floor wonderful.
His eyes took in everything, stairways and landings, like an adrift parched sailor with dry crusted lips would looked at a tall glass of unsalted water.
He made his way to the roof to overlook the city, acting worse than a tourist or a love-sick puppy.
He preferred the view of the buildings, comparing them to that of people, animated with its own stories.
